name: deserializeXML
description: Deserializes a string in XML format to a ColdFusion object.

params.name: string
params.description: A string that needs to be deserialized.

params.name: useCustomSerializer
params.description: This identifies whether or not to use the custom serializer. The default value is true. The custom serializer will be always used for XML deserialization. If false, the XML/JSON deserialization will be done using the default ColdFusion behavior. If any other type is passed with `useCustomSerializer` as false, then `TypeNotSupportedException` will be thrown.

links.title: REST Enhancements in ColdFusion 11
links.description: This discusses the site-level REST support added in CF11.
